jcr:content.jcr:description: SSL & TLS Certificates from Symantec. Secure your website and promote customer confidence with superior encryption and authentication from Symantec SSL/TLS certificates, formerly by VeriSign.
jcr:content.jcr:title: SSL/TLS Certificate
jcr:content.keywords: ssl certificate, ssl certificates, secure certificates, verisign, symantec ssl
jcr:content.pageTitle: SSL & TLS Certificates by Symantec, formerly from VeriSign.

containercomponent.desc: What’s in a Symantec SSL/TLS certificate? Enterprise-class strength. 100% root ubiquity in today’s browsers.  And industry-recognized support from the most established Certificate Authority in the world, formerly from VeriSign.
containercomponent.subtitle: SSL/TLS CERTIFICATES

containercomponent.subtitle: Symantec SSL/TLS: Benefits Beyond the Certificate

icontextandtitle.description2: Trust online starts with proof on-site. Display the #1 most recognized trust mark on the web.
The Norton Secured Seal next to your search listing adds power to your brand and your click-through rates.
Security is an absolute must, every second of every day. So when you need help, we’re here. No questions asked.
It's built right into every Symantec SSL/TLS certificate for added protection against malicious infections.

imageandtext.desc: When you buy your first SSL/TLS certificate, sign up for Symantec Trust Center to keep your finger on the pulse of all your certificates through one cloud-based console. So you can focus on running your business, safely.
imageandtext.subtitle: PROACTIVE PROTECTION, TOTAL CONTROL
imageandtext.title: Explore complete website security

containercomponent.subtitle: For Every Security Need, a Solution

imagetextandtitle.description: Currently, 97% of all websites are not encrypted, so their businesses and visitors are at risk. See how Symantec Encryption Everywhere changes the game for small businesses worldwide.
imagetextandtitle.subtitle: Encryption

imagetextandtitle.description: Our Customer Authentication Team upholds the highest standards on the web. We use the world's strictest processes to validate any business seeking an OV certificate.
imagetextandtitle.subtitle: Trust

imagetextandtitle.description: Our EV certificates’ ECC algorithm provides 64,000x the strength of RSA and visual cues that give customers confidence. Result: An average 17.8% lift in site conversions for business.
imagetextandtitle.subtitle: Maximum security

containerwithicontex.description: [When you need us\, we’re here. That’s why our Global Customer Service Satisfaction scores remain consistently above 90%.,Our security products and services are the product of 21 years of relentless problem solving. Choose yours here.,This is security built for business: Add and/or change your solutions according to your changing needs. Without missing a beat.]

containerwithicontex.subtitle:
Active Protection is Powerful.
Proactive Defense is Critical.
containerwithicontex.title: [Beyond the Call\, 24/7,Forward Thinking\, always,Agility+Growth: Opportunity]

carousel.desc: ["When we were managing SSL certificates ad-hoc\, we had delays as long as two weeks to get an SSL certificate. With Symantec Managed PKI for SSL\, we get them in minutes now. It’s a one-stop shop for managing\, requesting\, renewing\, and revoking certificates on demand.",“During the test\, users were more likely to click through and make a purchase when they saw the Norton Secured Seal. Based on this\, it’s clear to me that the Norton Secured Seal had the same\, if not better\, effect on helping my customers feel confident about making a purchase.” ,Brand protection is a top priority for ebay\, which has implemented a portfolio of Symantec security solutions as an underlying foundation; everything from data loss prevention\, to endpoint security\, to managed security\, to encryption technologies.,“With Symantec solutions\, we’re able to do more with the resources that we have. We can handle day-to-day operations while continuing to expand services to the county.”,“The trust factor was the main reason we chose Symantec. The Norton Secured Seal is very well known in the market.”]
